data.title: Owen Wilson to welcome son
data.meta_description: Actor Owen Wilson will welcome a son with his personal trainer Caroline Lindqvist.
data.text:
Actor Owen Wilson will welcome a son with his personal trainer Caroline Lindqvist.

A source told people.com that the 44-year-old actor, who has a two-year-old son Robert with his ex-girlfriend Jade Duell, is getting along well with Lindqvist and they plan to celebrate a baby shower here in December.

The news Wilson is going to be a father again was first revealed last month. Lindqvist, 41, is his long-time friend.

Wilson and Lindqvist met after the former attempted to commit suicide in 2007. He became good friends with Lindqvist, after which the actor hired her as his personal trainer.

Their relationship turned romantic after Lindqvist parted ways from her husband a year ago.
